items.sentence: How long did it take Tom to read this book?
The fire in the stove has gone out already.
We want to put in a new granite countertop.
Tyson followed up the jab with a left hook.
The town was subjected to an aerial attack.
You could stay at our house if you want to.
You can stay in Boston as long as you like.
You can do that without my help, can't you?
You can do that faster than I can, I think.
You can do that better than I can, I think.
You already know how to do that, don't you?
You should get Tom to tell Mary to do that.
You have to do that by the end of the week.
You must do that even if you don't want to.
You should try to do that the way Tom does.
You should tell Tom he's not likely to win.
You ought to tell Tom not to do that again.
You'd get in trouble if you didn't do that.
You were supposed to do that before Monday.
You told us you'd wouldn't do that anymore.
You might get hurt if you do that that way.
You look a little young to be a pharmacist.
You don't need to worry about that anymore.
You can do that if you put your mind to it.
You still plan to take pictures, don't you?
You still plan to join the team, don't you?
You don't plan on joining the team, do you?
You have no clue what you're doing, do you?
It'd be a good idea to tell Tom in advance.
I know that that won't happen anytime soon.
I told you I'm not a native French speaker.
You told me the meeting would be on Monday.
Somebody I didn't know called me yesterday.
Do you have any idea what's going on there?
Tom hasn't bought any bread in a long time.
Is that a bill that still needs to be paid?
That's how things have been since Tom left.
We might never find what we're looking for.
We were without electricity for three days.
Where in Australia would you like to visit?
How can you be sure that's going to happen?
Tom was supposed to help me, but he didn't.
I wouldn't be able to do that for a living.
Don't tell me that you've lost your ticket.
Tom was stopped at the border and searched.
This restaurant is only open in the summer.
That isn't the kind of thing we like to do.
Tom has to stay even if he doesn't want to.
I drove to Boston in less than three hours.
I may not be able to handle this situation.
Tom is actually a pretty good chess player.
There are so many places I'd like to visit.
Tom and Mary stayed in their rooms all day.
Tom paid Mary to take care of his children.
We're not exactly sure what the problem is.
Tom made me so angry that I hung up on him.
Tom liked almost everything about the trip.
How long does it take you to take a shower?
Why aren't you wearing your safety goggles?
Do you think I should allow Tom to do that?
Tom was the one who inspired us to do this.
Don't think I don't know what you're doing.
You know what I'm talking about, don't you?
Tom used a hammer to break the shop window.
Tom won't be coming to Australia this year.
Tom was afraid the police might arrest him.
Tom pretended he didn't know Mary was rich.
I heard Tom doesn't live in Boston anymore.
Tom asked me a lot of questions about Mary.
Maple trees grew on both sides of the road.
Get out of the way. You're blocking the TV.
Tom walked down the stairs to the basement.
Tom slurs his words whenever he gets drunk.
Tom seemed to be afraid to talk about that.
Tom doesn't doubt that Mary has to do that.
When do you plan to come home this evening?
When I was a student, I did that every day.
When was the last time you slept in a tent?
I want to be a valuable member of the team.
Tom was drinking by himself in his bedroom.
Don't talk to me before I've had my coffee.
I think our team will reach the semifinals.
If you aren't quiet, the baby will wake up.
There are around 20,000 castles in Germany.
You need to get out and get some fresh air.
Tom pulled out a knife and threatened Mary.
I don't know very much about what Tom does.
No matter what Tom says, I plan to do that.
We're here now so we might as well do that.
What's the weather like here in the spring?
Why isn't anyone skating on the pond today?
Tom asked me what I wanted for my birthday.
I don't see any reason why Tom would do it.
Tom, you've gotta go before Mary gets here.
I'm really glad that I was able to do that.
I'm glad that you showed me how to do that.
I'm sure that Tom will know how to do that.
I'm sure that Tom will be eager to do that.
I'm sure that you could do that if you try.
Tom must've noticed that Mary wasn't there.
